er.corebl.mail

Interface ERCMailer.MailerDelegate

  • Enclosing class:
    ERCMailer

    public static interface ERCMailer.MailerDelegate
    A MailerDelegate allows for message suppression and modification that is beyond the scope of the mailer daemon.
